profile.title: Liphrofayela Lemsebenzisi
profile.mustLogin: Kumele ungene ngemvume kuze ubone emasethingi.
profile.noPrivateKey: Alukho likhiwo langasese kule divayisi lekungaletfulwa.
profile.importFailed: Kwehluleke kungenisa likhiwo (libhacishi leliwudvwe noma lefayela lonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Kukhiqizwe likhiwo lelisha kwakhishwa lelikhulu emphakatsini.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Likhiwo lakho langasese alikashiyi le divayisi. Khipha likopi lelivikelwe ngebhacishi kutsi ulivuselele kwenye divayisi.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Useku Free—sebenzisa i-Sun/Moon esheshako ngaphansi. Nyusa kutojabulela imitfombo leminingi.
profile.backupDesc: Yakha tibackup letivikelwe ngebhacishi, bese uvuselela kwenye divayisi kutsi kuhlanganyele.
profile.followHint: Tindzaba tabo tibonakala ku-Following uma bakhipha bo-Followers (noma Public).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisela tincingo nemilayeto letangena kufoni yakho noma ku-email levunyetiwe. Lokuphumako kungakhombisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Khetsa okungenani lenye inhloso (foni noma i-email).
profile.errQuietHours: Emalanga ekuthula kumele abe phakathi kwa-0 na-23.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetsa umbhalo noma likamelo kuze uqale kukhuluma

status.filesNote: Kuya kufika ku-5 emafayela. Kuphela emahora angu-24 ngokuzenzakalela.

auth.headline: Imilayeto lepakeme, yasemtini nase mhlabeni wonkhe ngekuhumusha masinyane
auth.description: Kuvikelwa kuya ekugcineni, kuhumusha nge-AI, imilayeto leyanyamalala, nekushaya/kuvidiyo.

feature.privacy: Imfihlo kucala. Idatha yakho, kulawula kwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Ku-desktop? Skena ngefoni yakho kutsi uthole i-app.
auth.tip: Ungasebentisa i-Chatforia kunoma iyiphi idivayisi — noma wayidawuniloda i-app.
auth.scanHint: Skena kudawuniloda i-app noma uvule esipheqululini.

press.title: Press
press.contact: For media inquiries, reach us at press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: For media inquiries, reach us at press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia is a secure messenger with instant translation and E2E encryption, designed to make global conversations private and effortless.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, and product imagery (coming soon).

careers.title: Emsebenti
careers.intro: Singu-team lencane lakha umsamatfu lomhlaba wonkhe. Uma ukhatsateka ngekugcinwa kwemfihlo, kufinyeleleka, ne-UX le-jabulisayo, siyakuvumela kutsi utsintse.
careers.openRoles: Imisebenti levulekile: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Chatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia ingumsamisi lophephile, wemilwimi leminyenti nge-E2E encryption, kuhumusha masinyane, nekushaya/kuvidiyo. Inhloso yetfu ilula: kusita bantfu baxhumane—baphephile, bayimfihlo, futsi emalwimini abo.
about.howDescription: Imilayeto ivikelwa kudivayisi yakho ungakayikhishi. Kuhumusha, tibackup, neku-sync-a kwakhelwe kunciphisa lokubonwa yiseva yetfu.

advertise.title: Khangisa nge-Chatforia
advertise.description: Finyelela basebenti bemiyalezo ngekuma-brand-safe. Sinetindawo te-banner, sponsorships, ne-house promos. Labakhokha i-Premium abawati titsenga.

adsense.withPubId: We currently serve ads via Google AdSense. If you’d like to target us through Google Ads, use publisher ID {{pubId}} and ask for managed placement on our units below. Direct sponsorships are available—use the form.
adsense.noPubId: We currently serve ads via Google AdSense. Direct sponsorships are also available—use the form below.

why.highSession: Kuvakasha kaningi nesikhatsi lesidze esikrinini sengxoxo

form.mailtoInfo: Sivula i-email client yakho kutfumela umbuto…

upgrade.title: Nyusa
upgrade.subtitle: Vula luhlelo lolusebenta kuwe: Plus ngaphandle kwetitsenga, noma Premium letigcwele timphawu.

gettingStarted.title: Kucala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umsamatfu ku-Chatforia? Lomhlahlandlela losheshako utokukhombisa lokubalulekile ngemizuzu embalwa.

alert.text: Lo mhlahlandlela utokhula njengoba setfula timphawu letintsha. Uma kukhona lokulahlekile, sitsintse nge

section2.title: 2) Qala imiyalezo
section2.item1: Yakha i-DM noma Lihlelo bese uthumela umlayeto wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebentisa kuhumusha masinyane kukhuluma ngetilwimi leti-100+.
section2.item3: Linga imilayeto leyanyamalala netimaki tekufundvwa ku-Profile → Imfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Yiya phambili
section3.item2Part1: Xhumanisa tidivayisi letingeziwe bese usetha tibackup ku-

account.q: Ngakha kanjani noma ngibuyisa i-akhawunti yami?
account.a: Dawuniloda i-app noma sebenzisa i-web, chafata “Yakha i-akhawunti”, uqinisekise i-email/foni. Kubuyisa, sebenzisa “Ukhohlwe libhacishi”.

privacy.a: Yebo. Imilayeto netincingo tivikelwe kuya ekugcineni ngokuzenzakalela. Nguwe nemamukeli kuphela eningayifunda.

translate.a: Vulela “Humusha ngokuzenzakalela” ku-Settings → Appearance & Language. Siveta ku-divayisi lapho kuxhaswa khona, noma nge-API lecinisekisiwe ngemlomo lencane.

contact.a: Sitsintse ku support@chatforia.com. Faka tikhumbuto nesinombolo yesi-app sakho.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (“we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can’t read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don’t sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what’s needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can’t be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn’t directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We’ll post updates here and revise the “Last updated” date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don’t use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You’re responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided “as is” without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn’t liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Ungathengisi Noma Wabelane Ngolwazi Lwami Lomunye
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi lwati lomuntu. Bahlali baseCalifornia basengatfumela sicelo ngaphansi kwe-CPRA ngetinembalo letingentasi.

cookies.title: Kuseta Kwekukhukhi
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebentisa emakhukhi lalinganiselwe (isb., seshoni, kuvikeleka). Asisebentisi emakhukhi etsenga ekumele. Lawula emakhukhi ku-settings yesiphequluli sakho.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Kute inombolo lenikeletiwe. Khetsa ngekhiye wendzawo kuze uqale kutexta.

startChatModal.title: Qala ingxoxo
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Bhala libito, username, foni, noma i-email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Bhala i-username noma foni bese ucindezela Sesha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Emarekhodi e-foni/email atawubonakala uma sewawagcinile njengemacontact.

sounds.freeNotice: Useku Free — tintsinyo temsindo te-premium tibonisiwe kodvwa tivalekile. Nyusa kuze uvule tonkhe.

aiSettings.title: AI Settings
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula kuhumusha, timphendvulo lehlakaniphile, ne-ForiaBot auto-response.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Tfumela imilayeto lebambalwa yetakamuva (lehluziwe) ku-AI kutsi iphakame temphendvulo lesheshako.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Uma ivuliwe, tincomo letiBuyiselwa yi-AI titawuba nemavi labekiwe afihlakele

accessibilitySettings.title: Kufinyeleleka & Tsembiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Tikhetso tekukwenza kube lula ngaphandle kwemisindo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Iqala ngesayizi lejwayelekile. Yandisa uma ukhetsa umbhalo lomkhulu ku-accessibility.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Tsembiso letibonakalako temilayeto & tincingo
Khombisa tibhanela nekublinka kwetayitela.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibhritha uma kumilayeto lemisha (uma kuxhaswa)
Vuselela i-vibration yedivayisi ngetsembiso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khanyisa sikrini uma kunekufona
Kukhanya kafishane uma kukhalwa.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Humusha ngotomatisi tincwadzi temsindvo
Faka incazelo kumlayeto we-audio lomukelwe.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Khombisa tibhanela nekublinka kwetayitela kuze ungaphutseli lutfo.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Gcina kuphela i-ciphertext kuseva. Cisha AI/Humusha nekubuka kwe-moderation.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Sesha nge-aliasi, libito, username, noma foni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Yabelana ngesixhumanisi sakho sekumema kuze uqale ingxoxo masinyane.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Imilayeto yakho ihlala i-sync phakathi kwe-web ne-mobile.

randomChat.title: Ingxoxo lengahleliwe
randomChat.description: Hlangana nomuntfu lomusha masinyane. Sitakuhlanganisa sivule likamelo lesikhashana.
randomChat.saveGuard: Imngcele: Emangxoxo emabili bantfu kuphela angagcinwa
